main.name: Aayush Jain
main.bio: Hi, I'm Aayush, an aspirant who welcomes challenging projects and enjoys working with all sorts of personalities. I have quite a few experience as an Intern in startups but now I'm looking for an organization where I can utilize my existing skills and knowledge and get coupled with embedded expertise to contribute in the accomplishment of organizational goals. Furthermore, I am quick learner and a great team player which makes me flexible and adaptive to all sort of enviroments and modern technologies.

education.degree: B.E. Computer Science with Specialisation in Internet of Things

work.title: SDE Intern
work.description:
• Technologies Used: React.js, Django, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
 • Built an ERP model to maintain a workflow of a business or an organisation.
• Built various reusable components which were used widely in the project and integrated them with Django APIs.
 • Debugged and tested various modules.

work.title: Intern
